definitions.definition: To cause to become numb (physically or emotionally).
definitions.example: The dentist gave me novocaine to numb my tooth before drilling, thank goodness.

definitions.definition: To cause (a feeling) to be less intense.
definitions.example: He turned to alcohol to numb his pain.

definitions.definition: To cause (the mind, faculties, etc.) to be less acute.
Physically unable to feel, not having the power of sensation.
Emotionally unable to feel or respond in a normal way.
definitions.example: numb with shock; numb with boredom
